remarks: Inner product operation for the final constructed Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilip.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilip.l $e |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilip.v $e |- V = ( Base ` L ) $.
hlhilip.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilip.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilip.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilip.p $e |- ., = ( x e. V , y e. V |-> ( ( S ` y ) ` x ) ) $.
hlhilip $p |- ( ph -> ., = ( .i ` U ) ) $.
$d K x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d W x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
